## gocan create-app

Create an application in a scene

```
gocan create-app [flags]
```

### Examples

```
gocan create-app myapp --scene myscene
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for create-app
  -s, --scene string   Scene name
      --verbose        display the log information
```
